text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's finally Friday. I'm finishing up the<n>last bit of work and
getting ready for<n>afternoon training when...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thump, thump, thump!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Buuuuuenos tardeeesss! How're<n>you doin', Trainer!
choice_data_list: I see you're as excited as ever, El.
I see you're as excited as ever, El.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yup, I'm always full of energy!<n>Whether I'm on the turf or
not, I'm<n>always going full throttle!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Are you feelin' a bit under the<n>weather, Trainer? But
we were just<n>about to start training!
choice_data_list: I guess the fatigue is catching up to me...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Qué?! How come?! What happened?!<n>The sun's out—it's
way too early to<n>be burning out!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, aren't we aiming to be the<n>world's strongest?! If
we aren't<n>peppy, then what are we?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Now, suck in your gut! Then, breathe<n>in! Get that fresh air
into your lungs!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Look alive, Trainer—we're goin' on a<n>run!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Sí! I always run when I'm energetic!<n>Which means that
running makes you<n>energetic! C'mon, let's gooooo!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Uno, dos, tres! Raise those thighs!<n>Match your cadence to
my rhythm!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Right! Just like that! Next up, fly with<n>me through the sky!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Shout! Leap! Let the fires of passion<n>burn bright! Good,
we've only got ten<n>laps to go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, we finish our impromptu<n>training session with El as
my trainer.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Bueno! I'm glad I picked you as my<n>trainer! We make a
good team!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I really felt your passion on that final<n>lap. I'm proud of you.
You get an A+!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Haaahahaha! You're very welcome!<n>We worked up a good
sweat, didn't<n>we? Another productive day of<n>training—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Huh? Training?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Trainer! I haven't done any training<n>yet today!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Quickly, speedily—swiftly! Let us<n>sound the gong! Now's
when the real<n>training beg—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ding-dong, bing-bong...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Qué?! The bell! But that means—

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Sigh... This week was a realdoozy. Hey, wanna hit up theconvenience store?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: You know it. I just wanna grab<n>something sweet and chill.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Wh-wh-wha?! Everyone's leaving<n>the track... Don't tell
me... Is it already<n>time to go home?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Trainer, does that mean we're<n>finished too?
choice_data_list: I can keep you company for a bit longer.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Traaainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Gah, I'm so happy! I'm glad I picked<n>you as my trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
All right, time to get back into gear and<n>start training! Let's
run towards the<n>setting sun until that riverbank—no,<n>until
the sea!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I know, I know. Don't worry so<n>much!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Training with El is a lot of fun, but I<n>wonder if I'll be able to
walk<n>tomorrow...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: What're you spacin' out for,<n>Trainer?! I'll leave you behind!
